pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 11, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 11, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Tina Brown for the Women in the World Summit.

Baillie Court – Art Gallery of Ontario
317 Dundas Street West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m. and check in at the group entrance

St. John’s, Newfoundland

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Come From Away Forum in honour of the anniversary of September 11th, 2001.

Arts and Culture Centre
95 Allandale Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:00 p.m.


Note: All times local
